pages.text: Created using an $(blood)Alchemy Array$() by combining a $(l:animus:items/reagenttransposition)Reagent: Transposition$() with a $(item)Demon Slate$(). The reagent must first be forged in the Hellfire Forge.
Move blocks and teleport entities through space itself. The Sigil of Transposition allows you to relocate blocks without breaking them, and transport entities to bound Teleposers.

pages.title: Block Transposition
pages.text: $(bold)LP Cost:$() 5000 per transposition$(br2)$(bold)Step 1:$() Right-click a block to select it as the source. The sigil will activate.$(br2)$(bold)Step 2:$() Right-click on another block's face to move the selected block adjacent to it.$(br2)$(bold)Clear:$() Right-click air to clear selection.

pages.title: Entity Teleportation
pages.text: $(bold)LP Cost:$() 2000 per teleportation$(br2)$(bold)Bind:$() Sneak + right-click a $(l:bloodmagic:utility/teleposer)Teleposer$() to bind its location.$(br2)$(bold)Teleport:$() Attack an entity to teleport it 1 block above the bound Teleposer.$(br2)$(bold)Player Restriction:$() Can only teleport players if they are sneaking.$(br2)$(italic)The Teleposer must still exist at the bound location for teleportation to work.$()

pages.title: Restrictions
pages.text: $(bold)Protection:$() Respects chunk protection (FTB Chunks, etc.)$(br2)$(bold)Relocation Tag:$() Cannot move blocks tagged $(#)forge:relocation_not_supported$()$(br2)$(bold)Destination:$() Target location must be air$(br2)$(bold)Teleposer:$() Must be bound to a valid Teleposer for entity teleportation$(br2)The sigil will chunk-load the source area during transposition to ensure safety.

pages.title: Applications
pages.text: Perfect for:$(li)Moving complex machinery$(li)Relocating filled chests$(li)Rearranging your base$(li)Moving spawners$(li)Transporting tile entities$(li)Teleporting mobs to farms$(li)Creating trap systems$(br2)$(italic)Beware: With great power comes great responsibility. Always verify you have permission before moving blocks or teleporting entities.$()
